languages.text: {n}Что бы ни было тут установлено, оно, судя по масштабам крепежей, пролезло бы в дыру в потолке. Остается лишь вопрос, что это было... Впрочем, догадаться не так уж сложно, учитывая одержимость Тервантьяса его "шедевром".{/n}

{n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что бы ни было тут установлено, оно, судя по масштабам крепежей, пролезло бы в дыру в потолке. Остается лишь вопрос, что это было... Впрочем, догадаться не так уж сложно, учитывая одержимость Тервантьяса его "шедевром".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この部屋にどのような仕掛けがあったにせよ、備品の大きさから察するに、天井の穴を通して運び出された可能性が高い。唯一の疑問点は、それが何であったのかということだ。テルヴァンティアスが自身の「傑作」に執着していたことを考えれば、およその推測はつきそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この部屋にどのような仕掛けがあったにせよ、備品の大きさから察するに、天井の穴を通して運び出された可能性が高い。唯一の疑問点は、それが何であったのかということだ。テルヴァンティアスが自身の「傑作」に執着していたことを考えれば、およその推測はつきそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}虽然不知道这个房间里曾经装过什么东西，但从固定装置的尺寸判断，它可能被人从天花板上的洞带走了。唯一的问题是：那究竟是什么东西？考虑到特万提亚斯对“杰作”的痴迷，行商浪人尽可以大胆推测这个装置的具体用途。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quel qu'ait été l'engin abrité dans cet endroit, au vu de la taille des installations, il passait certainement par le trou dans le plafond. Le tout est de savoir de quoi il s'agissait. Enfin, étant donné l'obsession de Tervantias pour son « chef-d'œuvre », il n'est pas difficile de parvenir à une hypothèse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}

Le tout est de savoir de quoi il s'agissait. Enfin, étant donné l'obsession de Tervantias pour son « chef-d'œuvre », il n'est pas difficile de parvenir à une hypothèse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No sabes qué trasto había alojado en esta cámara, pero a juzgar por el tamaño de las conexiones atravesaba el agujero del techo. La pregunta es ¿de qué se trataba? Dada la obsesión de Tervantias con su «obra maestra», la respuesta parece evidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No sabes qué trasto había alojado en esta cámara, pero a juzgar por el tamaño de las conexiones atravesaba el agujero del techo. La pregunta es ¿de qué se trataba? Dada la obsesión de Tervantias con su «obra maestra», la respuesta parece evidente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Egal, welche Apparatur in dieser Kammer untergebracht war, der Größe der Befestigungen nach, könnte sie durch das Loch in der Decke abtransportiert worden sein. Die Frage ist nur: Was war es? Wobei man angesichts Tervantias' Besessenheit von seinem 'Meisterstück' wohl einen Tipp abgeben könnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu bölmede bulunan şey, etraftaki eşyaların boyutuna bakılırsa tavandaki delikten çıkmış olabilir. Kim bilir neydi... Gerçi Tervantias'ın kafayı taktığı "başyapıtı" düşünülürse tahmin etmek zor değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whatever contraption this chamber used to house, judging by the size of the fixtures, it could have gone through the hole in the ceiling. The only question is: what was it? Although, given Tervantias's obsession with his "masterpiece," one could venture a guess.{/n}
